message: Yeah the hate is horrible! I can't believe it is 2016. 75 years ago WW2 Resurgence of close mindedness is so scary. I grieve for people at most risk of abuse & harassment. It is the best of times and the worst of times it seems. Keep you & yours safe and happy.

I have been unable to complete this post, but the gist is for me Hillary cannot answer to diverse groups. One group with one agenda. Than the media covers content to keep the next group blind. Many of her base are in conflict with one another and an open forum would be detrimental to her campaign. Her campaign is now in trouble as her numbers drop and sanders rise if Bernie goes for the jugular she will bleed like a stuck hog. Her campaign is deception, and Bernie, and trump could bring this out as they are both on the inside.
